query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Qual si partio Ipolito d’Atene 47 per la spietata e perfida noverca, 48 tal di Fiorenza partir ti convene.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Questo si vuole e questo già si cerca, 50 e tosto verrà fatto a chi ciò pensa 51 là dove Cristo tutto dì si merca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 La colpa seguirà la parte offensa 53 in grido, come suol; ma la vendetta 54 fia testimonio al ver che la dispensa.
query.error: **English:** 52 The fault will follow the offended party 53 in outcry, as is usual; but vengeance 54 will bear witness to the truth that excuses it.
query.result: 52 Kesalahan akan mengikuti pihak yang tersinggung 53 dalam teriakan, seperti biasa; tetapi pembalasan 54 akan menjadi saksi bagi kebenaran yang memaafkannya.

query.prompt:

query.result: 55 Engkau akan meninggalkan segala sesuatu yang dicintai 56 dengan sangat sayang; dan inilah anak panah 57 yang pertama kali ditembakkan oleh busur pengasingan.
